segments.text: There are two kids trying to get cookies from the jar, and they seem to be doing it secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching up into the cabinet, trying to get as many cookies as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing right next to him, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she's waiting for a real treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their teamwork, even though they're being a bit naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, I'm surprised it hasn't tipped over yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, trying to reach the jar without falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, but I also hope they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, so patient and eager.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how many cookies they think they can take without getting in trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
